mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodPrcResve Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , PRC_RESVE_SECT_CD , RESVE_BEG_DT , RESVE_END_DT , RESVE_RTL_PRC , RESVE_CSMR_PRC , RESVE_EMP_PRC , RESVE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_PRC_RESVE WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRC_RESVE_SECT_CD = #{prcResveSectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RESVE_BEG_DT = #{resveBegDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
